vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion to enter into a grant agreement with Women for Economic and Leadership Development to support its leadership programs and trainings; to authorize the transfer and expenditure of $10,000.00 from the general fund. ($10,000.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
 
1. BACKGROUND
This ordinance authorizes the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion to enter into a grant agreement with Women for Economic and Leadership Development (WELD) in support of its women’s leadership programs and trainings;  
Women for Economic and Leadership Development (WELD) is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization that builds programs, events, and community to support leadership development of women and drive business growth. The organization develops and advances women’s leadership to strengthen the economic prosperity of the community it serves.
2. FISCAL IMPACT
The funding of $10,000.00 is available in the General Fund for the Office of Diversity and Inclusion.
 
Title
 
To authorize the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion to enter into a grant agreement with Women for Economic and Leadership Development to support its leadership programs and trainings; to authorize the transfer and expenditure of $10,000.00 from the general fund. ($10,000.00)
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the mission of the Women for Economic and Leadership Development (WELD) is to develop and advance women’s leadership to strengthen the economic prosperity of the community it serves.
WHEREAS, WELD is the national model for implementing strategies to advance women to higher levels of leadership and economic strength, deploying resources to accelerate educational programming and events. 
WHEREAS, it is necessary to authorize an expenditure of $10,000.00 in the general fund; 
WHEREAS, it has become necessary in the usual daily operation of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion to enter into a grant agreement with the Women for Economic and Leadership Development for its women’s leadership programs and events in the amount of $10,000.00, for the promotion of pathways for women to reach economic prosperity and build strong community connections; NOW, THEREFORE,
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
SECTION 1. That the Director of the Office of Diversity and Inclusion is hereby authorized to enter into a grant agreement with the Women for Economic and Leadership Development in support of its women’s leadership programs and trainings;  
SECTION 2. That per the action authorized in Section 1 of this ordinance, the transfer and expenditure of $10,000.00, or so much thereof as may be needed, is hereby authorized from the general fund, per the accounting codes in the attachment to this ordinance.
SECTION 3. That the funds necessary to carry out the purpose of this ordinance are hereby deemed appropriated and the City Auditor shall establish such accounting codes as necessary.
SECTION 4. That the City Auditor is authorized to make any accounting changes to revise the funding source for all contracts or contract modifications associated with this ordinance.
SECTION 5. That this ordinance shall take effect at the earliest date allowable by law.
